Lera Lynn and her unique indie country sound is as refreshing as bourbon- spiked lemonade on a sweltering summer day, and just as intoxicating. Her sultry voice wraps around her melodies, enveloping the listener. Her lyrics are rife with a plainspoken yet cutthroat honesty, putting a pain in your heart that feels good. And her chordings, distinct, original and timeless nonetheless, reveal a songwriting craftsman already well on her way to establishing a niche her very own. Seriously, y'all, get into Lera Lynn.
